suncertify.model

Interface IAppModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AppModel

    public interface IAppModel
    This interface defines the methods required by the Model in the application.
    Author:
    Robbie Byrne

    • Method Summary

      This method is used to implement the Observer pattern by adding an Observer.

      This method is used to get the corresponding record number for a selection in the JTable.

      Allows the client to get the cookie that locked the record.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllRecords

        java.util.List<HotelRoom> getAllRecords()
        This method defines how to get all records.
        Returns:
        List of Room objects.

      • queryRecords

        java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,HotelRoom> queryRecords(java.lang.String name,
                                                      java.lang.String location)
        This method defines how to query the Cache for a subset of records based on criteria.
        Parameters:
        name - String name of hotel.
        location - String location of hotel.
        Returns:
        A Map of record numbers for keys and Room objects for values.

      • getRoomFeilds

        java.lang.String[] getRoomFeilds()
        This method is used to obtain the field names of a record.
        Returns:
        String array of field names.

      • updateRecord

        void updateRecord(long recNo,
                java.lang.String owner,
                long cookie)
                  throws RecordNotFoundException,
                         suncertify.db.RecordNotAvailableException,
                         SecurityException
        This method is used to update the owner of a record.
        Parameters:
        recNo - The record number of the record.
        owner - The owner id String to be applied to record.
        Throws:
        RecordNotFoundException - Thrown if the record number does not exist.
        suncertify.db.RecordNotAvailableException - Thrown if the record is already booked.
        SecurityException - Thrown if the cookie used to unlock the record is different than the cookie generated when the record was locked

      • addObserver

        void addObserver(java.util.Observer observer)
        This method is used to implement the Observer pattern by adding an Observer.
        Parameters:
        observer - Observer object.

      • removeObserver

        void removeObserver(java.util.Observer observer)
        This method is used to remove an Observer.
        Parameters:
        observer - Observer object.

      • getActualIndexMap

        java.lang.Long getActualIndexMap(int selection)
        This method is used to get the corresponding record number for a selection in the JTable.
        Parameters:
        selection - JTable selection number.
        Returns:
        Record number corresponding to selection.

      • getTotalNumberRecords

        int getTotalNumberRecords()
        This method is used to return total number of records.
        Returns:
        int representing total number of records.

      • getCookie

        long getCookie()
        Allows the client to get the cookie that locked the record.
        Returns:
        the cookie used to lock a record.
